pr_title: Add button in settings to clear reCAPTCHA cookies

timeline.bodyText: Maybe also add a summary, saying something like "if you were asked to solve a reCAPTCHA, permission cookies may have been stored on the device"

replies.bodyText: A summary is to explain what the setting will do. That sentence doesn't explain that.
replies.author: wb9688

replies.bodyText: Yeah, but it explains why that setting is there. Otherwise one would see the word "cookie" and go mad at NewPipe thinking it is tracking him, even if he never solved a recaptcha
replies.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText: Good point. There should be an explanation.
replies.author: TobiGr

timeline.bodyText:
Here you should also clear the downloader's cookies:
DownloaderImpl.getInstance().setCookie(ReCaptchaActivity.RECAPTCHA_COOKIES_KEY, "");
timeline.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText: Oh, I forgot we kept it in memory there.
